'''Lazurite Swirl''' is a [[Card Back]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]] purchased from the [[Card Shop]] for {{Item|Lucky Coin|x=12,000}}. It could be obtained from the Event Quest ''[[Joy Above the Clouds]]'' during [[Windblume's Breath]] for free.

==Description==
{{Description|A special card back customized by the renowned artist [[Calx]].<br>"Like the [[Dvalin|Dragon of the East]], stretch your wings more freely on this battlefield of cards!"}}
